title: Elder shares traditional skill with neighborhood
description: Elder shares traditional skill with neighborhood
content:
Scenario: Elder shares traditional skill with neighborhood
    Given Rose is an expert seamstress with 60 years experience
    When she offers to teach mending and sewing skills
    And she creates a contribution proposing weekly sewing circles
    Then the contribution reaches her neighborhood
    And community members interested in learning can respond
    And a neighborhood sewing circle forms with Rose as mentor
    And Rose experiences being valued for her knowledge
    And traditional skills are preserved and transmitted
